subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: With the score tied, Dirk Nowitzki launched a fadeaway shot that caromed straight up and fell through the basket, sinking the Knicks and Carmelo Anthony, who had 44 points.
snippet: With the score tied, Dirk Nowitzki launched a fadeaway shot that caromed straight up and fell through the basket, sinking the Knicks and Carmelo Anthony, who had 44 points.
